How can you reveal his secrets?

The great and feared Skeletony is the king of the dark and powerful force in the east, the skeletons.

He is feared by many, especially by the kingdom in the west, Rongod. His fiercest enemy is the beloved prince of Rongod, Maenan.

Tales tell that Skeletony stand at a staggering 25 ft 8 inches tall and even though he lacks flesh, blood and intestants he weighs 4000lbs.

The weapon of his choice is the same as the skeletons which goes by the name of: The sons of Skeletony, however the giant sword that lies in his hands weighs as much as 200 of the swords that the skeletons bear.

Skeletony has an army of 20000 loyal, hard-fighting skeletons who are ready to risk their lives for Skeletonys glory.

No Rongodian know exactly where Skeletony live but some think that he sleeps and lives on a bed of fallen skeletons, in the far east, where darkness is always present.

Skeletony has no idendity and no desire, except capturing the precious stone. Some say that he is created by the darkness.
